content: with the treble_crochet of the body -> don t forget to stuff it after probably the half way trrough -> important notes on next page -> end with a slip_stitch and fasten_off leaving a long tail if you finished the stuffing but don t stuff too much only a little bit probably half of the stuffing you would normally use else it s going to look too stuffed / big but take as much time as you need till you re completly satisfied with the look and push it with your fingers in the perfect form -> sew between the curvature a little bit so it looks a bit more threedimensional -> don t pull the stitches between the parts where you slip stitched at the step before too tigh -> go with the needle through the red spot picture and then through the bottom and back preferably you sew over one or two stitchches at the bottom and don t use the same stitch -> this doing like 2 times on every spot will make it sit mostly flat and evenly and also creates little dents you can see on the last picture -> sew on the eyes and the blush if you want it -> i used felt for the eyes but you can also sew them on with black yarn or use safety eyes -> place them between row 6 and 7 or maybe a little bit more down if you think so with 8 or 9 stitches apart -> i sew the blush with 3 big stripes over 3 or 4 rounds and two little ones on each side but feel free to sew it on how you like it if you want to add a little lilium flower like the secret style follow the next steps petal repeat 4 times 1 chain 11 2 in 3rd chain of hook 3 half_double_crochet 4sc 2 slip_stitch chain 1 then crochet at the backside of the chains 2 slip_stitch 4 single_crochet 3 half_double_crochet 3 slip_stitch in same stitch then fasten_off leaving a tail for sewing first blossom second blossom 1 chain 6 1 chain 5 2 in second chain of hook 5 single_crochet 2 in second chain of hook 4 single_crochet 3 fasten_off 3 fasten_off -> place and sew the petals and blossoms on top of the head wherever you want it or use the pictures as help one petal and one blossom -> and there it is your new cute little friend d thank you again for using this pattern and i hope you enjoyed it -> also thanks so much to the testers
